name: private motability
text: Vehicle sold under the motability scheme and financed privately or with hire purchase

name: private other
text: Vehicle sold to a private individual and is not a private motability or captive / private registration

name: Captive / private
text: Vehicle sold under a motor manufacturer / franchise importer employee purchase plan

name: business leasing / contract hire
text: Vehicle sold to / registered for a business that operates between 1 and 24 vehicles and that business will be leasing or contract hiring the vehicle to its customers

name: business daily rental
text: Vehicle sold to / registered for a business that operates between 1 and 24 vehicles and that business will rent out the vehicle at a daily rate to its customers

name: business other
text: Vehicle sold to / registered for a small business that operates between 1 and 24 vehicles which is not covered by the daily rental, leasing / contract hire or motor trade demonstrator definitions

name: fleet leasing / contract hire
text: Vehicle sold to / registered for a company that operates a fleet of 25 vehicles or more and that company will rent out the vehicle at a daily rate to its customers

name: fleet daily rental
text: Vehicle sold to / registered for a company that operates a fleet of 25 vehicles or more and that company will be leasing or contract hiring vehicle to its customer

name: fleet demonstrator
text: Vehicle registered as a customer demonstrator by a motor trade dealer, or agent who operates a fleet of 25 vehicles or more

name: business demonstrator
text: Vehicle registered as a customer demonstrator by a motor trade dealer, or agent who operates a fleet of between 1 and 24 vehicles

name: fleet motability
text: Vehicle registered registered under the motability scheme to be operated against the contract hire plan

name: fleet other
text: Vehicle sold to / registered for a company that operates a fleet of 25 vehicles or more and is not covered by the leasing / contract hire, daily rental, dealer demonstrator or motability definitions

name: manufacturer / importer demonstrator
text: Vehicle registered by a motor manufacturer / franchised importer to be used on their demonstrator fleet

name: manufacturer / importer demonstrator other
text: Vehicle registered by a motor manufacturer / franchised importer for use as an executive job / pool car or for a management car plan scheme or for lease directly to their employees

name: private british forces germany
text: Vehicle registered for export for british forces germany

name: private british forces non-eu
text: Vehicle registered for export for british forces non-eu

name: business diplomatic / consular
text: Vehicle registered for diplomatic / consular

name: private foreign servicemen
text: Vehicle registered for use by foreign servicemen

name: private personal export non-eu
text: Vehicle registered for export for personal export non-eu

name: british forces eu
text: Vehicle registered for export for british forces eu

name: private personal export eu
text: Vehicle registered for export for personal export eu
